subcategories.name: Digital Signal Processors
subcategories.description: Specialized processors for digital signal processing

details.description: Integrated Circuits (ICs) are the foundation of modern electronics, containing thousands to billions of transistors on a single chip. These semiconductor devices perform various functions from simple logic operations to complex processing tasks.
details.marketInfo: The global IC market is valued at over $500 billion and continues to grow with advancements in AI, IoT, and 5G technologies.

subcategories.name: Diodes
subcategories.description: Rectifier, Zener, Schottky, and LED diodes

subcategories.name: Transistors
subcategories.description: BJT, MOSFET, and JFET transistors

subcategories.name: Thyristors
subcategories.description: SCRs, TRIACs, and DIACs

subcategories.name: Power MOSFETs
subcategories.description: High-power switching and amplification transistors

subcategories.name: RF Transistors
subcategories.description: Radio frequency amplification and switching devices

details.description: Discrete semiconductors are individual electronic components that perform a single function, unlike integrated circuits. They include diodes, transistors, thyristors, and other power devices essential for circuit design.
details.marketInfo: The discrete semiconductor market is driven by automotive electronics, renewable energy, and industrial automation sectors.

subcategories.name: Resistors
subcategories.description: Fixed and variable resistors for current limiting and voltage division

subcategories.name: Capacitors
subcategories.description: Ceramic, electrolytic, and film capacitors for energy storage

subcategories.name: Inductors
subcategories.description: Coils and chokes for energy storage and filtering

subcategories.name: Transformers
subcategories.description: AC voltage transformation and isolation components

subcategories.name: Crystals & Oscillators
subcategories.description: Frequency control and timing components

details.description: Passive components are fundamental building blocks that don't require external power to operate. They include resistors, capacitors, inductors, and transformers that control, store, or transform electrical energy.
details.marketInfo: The passive components market is experiencing growth due to miniaturization trends and increased demand in consumer electronics.

subcategories.name: Relays
subcategories.description: Electromagnetic switches for high current/voltage applications

subcategories.name: Switches
subcategories.description: Mechanical and electronic switching devices

subcategories.name: Motors
subcategories.description: DC, AC, servo, and stepper motors

subcategories.name: Actuators
subcategories.description: Linear and rotary motion control devices

subcategories.name: Contactors
subcategories.description: Heavy-duty electrical switching devices

details.description: Electromechanical components combine electrical and mechanical processes, including relays, switches, motors, and actuators. They provide the interface between electronic control systems and physical mechanisms.
details.marketInfo: The electromechanical market is growing with Industry 4.0 adoption and smart home technology integration.

subcategories.name: Board-to-Board
subcategories.description: PCB interconnection connectors

subcategories.name: Wire-to-Board
subcategories.description: Cable to PCB connection solutions

subcategories.name: Circular Connectors
subcategories.description: Rugged round connectors for harsh environments

subcategories.name: USB Connectors
subcategories.description: Universal serial bus interface connectors

subcategories.name: RF Connectors
subcategories.description: Radio frequency coaxial connectors

details.description: Connectors are electromechanical devices that join electrical circuits together. They range from simple wire-to-board connectors to complex high-speed data connectors for telecommunications and computing.
details.marketInfo: The connector market is driven by data center expansion, 5G infrastructure, and electric vehicle adoption.

subcategories.name: Oscilloscopes
subcategories.description: Signal analysis and waveform measurement instruments

subcategories.name: Multimeters
subcategories.description: Voltage, current, and resistance measurement tools

subcategories.name: Function Generators
subcategories.description: Signal generation and synthesis equipment

subcategories.name: Power Supplies
subcategories.description: Programmable DC and AC power sources

subcategories.name: Spectrum Analyzers
subcategories.description: Frequency domain signal analysis instruments

details.description: Test equipment encompasses instruments and tools used to measure, analyze, and verify the performance of electronic circuits and semiconductor devices. This includes oscilloscopes, multimeters, spectrum analyzers, and specialized semiconductor testers.
details.marketInfo: The test equipment market is expanding with the complexity of modern electronics and stringent quality requirements.

subcategories.name: Soldering Equipment
subcategories.description: Soldering irons, stations, and accessories

subcategories.name: Hand Tools
subcategories.description: Pliers, screwdrivers, and specialty tools

subcategories.name: ESD Protection
subcategories.description: Anti-static equipment and supplies

subcategories.name: Cleaning Supplies
subcategories.description: Flux removers, cleaners, and maintenance chemicals

subcategories.name: Prototyping
subcategories.description: Breadboards, protoboards, and development tools

popularParts.description: Anti-Static Wrist Strap with 6ft Coil Cord

details.description: Tools and supplies include hand tools, soldering equipment, cleaning materials, and consumables essential for electronic assembly, repair, and maintenance. These products ensure proper handling and processing of sensitive electronic components.
details.marketInfo: The tools and supplies market grows with electronics manufacturing and the maker movement.

subcategories.name: Pressure Sensors

subcategories.name: Optical Sensors
subcategories.description: Photodiodes, ambient light sensors, and proximity sensors

subcategories.name: Magnetic Sensors
subcategories.description: Hall effect sensors, magnetometers, and reed switches

details.description: Sensors detect and respond to physical phenomena, converting them into electrical signals. They include temperature, pressure, motion, light, and chemical sensors that enable smart systems and IoT applications.
details.marketInfo: The sensor market is experiencing rapid growth driven by IoT, autonomous vehicles, and smart city initiatives.

subcategories.name: LEDs
subcategories.description: Light emitting diodes for indicators and illumination

subcategories.description: Light detection and conversion devices

subcategories.description: Optical isolation and signal transmission devices

subcategories.name: Laser Diodes
subcategories.description: Coherent light generation devices

subcategories.description: LED displays, OLED, and LCD modules

details.description: Optoelectronic devices convert between light and electrical signals. This category includes LEDs, laser diodes, photodetectors, optocouplers, and displays that enable visual interfaces and optical communication.
details.marketInfo: The optoelectronics market is booming with LED adoption, display technology advances, and optical communication expansion.

subcategories.description: Surge protection devices

subcategories.name: PTC Resettable Fuses
subcategories.description: Polymeric positive temperature coefficient devices

subcategories.description: Voltage-dependent resistors for surge protection

details.description: Circuit protection devices safeguard electronic systems from overcurrent, overvoltage, and other electrical hazards. They include fuses, circuit breakers, TVS diodes, and surge protectors essential for system reliability.
details.marketInfo: The circuit protection market grows with increasing electronic content in vehicles and renewable energy systems.

subcategories.description: Isolated and non-isolated power conversion modules

subcategories.name: Battery Management
subcategories.description: Charging controllers and fuel gauge ICs

subcategories.name: Power Modules

details.description: Power products include voltage regulators, power management ICs, DC-DC converters, and power modules that efficiently convert and control electrical power in electronic systems.
details.marketInfo: The power products market is driven by energy efficiency requirements and the transition to renewable energy.

subcategories.description: Ethernet, USB, and serial communication cables

details.description: Cables and wires provide electrical connections between components and systems. They range from simple hookup wire to complex multi-conductor cables for data transmission and power distribution.
details.marketInfo: The cable and wire market is expanding with infrastructure development and high-speed data requirements.
